website_summaries.verdict: A modern polyester armchair in your choice of five colors.
pros: Choose one of the bolder shades if you want a pop of color
cons: Some owners say it's not as comfortable as it looks

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair, good value!
customer_reviews.text: I am looking for an accent piece that is good for reading. This is perfect. This chair looks even better in person. The blue color is true to the photo and the fabric is textured. I'm okay with the cushion firmness, and feel nice and spacious to sit in. Assembly doesn't take long, personally, it is fairly easy. Very pleased with the quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: WC Loo

customer_reviews.title: Great accent chair
customer_reviews.text: Great accent chair. Nice pop of color in our living room. Simple, classic design looks good and is pretty comfy. Seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: H.P.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is gorgeous! Easy to put together, sturdy and looks great. Not the most comfortable chair but not bad.
customer_reviews.author: yamamomma

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking chair, somewhat comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking chair. The wooden armrest and legs appear to be made out of real wood. wood finish is very smooth and soft to the touch. There's also a very sturdy chair. I ordered the blue fabric. It is very nice-looking. I would not purchase this chair if you are looking for a chair to sit in for long periods of time. It is a very firm chair. The backrest does not have a lot of padding. I would highly recommend this chair if you intend to put it in a guest room or hallway. Assembly was relatively simple. I was able to do it by myself. Although, it is a two-person job ideally.
customer_reviews.author: S83t

customer_reviews.title: Great Accent Chair
customer_reviews.text: The chair arrived early. Easy to put together, about 10 min. Fairly comfortable. I am 6'4 1/2, the arm rest are a little short for me, but managable. Overall, I am satisified with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper 16

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: A little firmer than I expected but very easy to assemble. Looks great. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Marti

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, easy to assemble, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The chair is a beautiful mid century modern style at a very affordable price came packaged well and was super easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Great value, but needs an extra pillow (or two) to make it comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I was really hesitant to buy these, but glad I did. They are not the most comfortable chair. But, with use, I’ve found them to get a little softer over time (at least the bottom cushion). For the back, I purchased a nice memory foam lumbar pillow, and they’ve worked out to be the missing element to make these pretty comfortable sitting chair. I can easily spend a few hours reading a good book, now, with no discomfort. For the money, this has turned out much better than I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: David Cates

customer_reviews.title: A Classic Furniture Piece
customer_reviews.text: Was looking around everywhere for an affordable classic chair that would fit my living room and add some color. The chair was easy to assemble with only five pieces of material and all tools included. The blue is quite dark..more of a medium navy color, which I prefer. In addition, I like the comfortable fabric and sturdiness of the item with the bottom cushion being very think and low to the ground. My only issue is that the posterior cushion is a little stiff on the back. Would suggest a small pillow as a simple solution for support. Overall, I’d buy the product again and recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: NurseDavid

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Wanted...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great looking chair. Nice wood, nice colour too. Putting it together, a little awkward for one person...it's a two person job.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: This Chair is a winner!!! Price, comfort & style!!
customer_reviews.text: Was more then pleased with this beautiful teal colored chair! Easy to put together, took just a few minutes. Was surprised at the comfort, usually these type of chairs are more for accent but this one is very comfy....everyone who comes into my front room their eyes are drawn to my chair & love it. If I ever decide to change my color scheme I will most definitely buy this chair again in a different color & it comes in several colors...
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good chair for the money! I bought two of these to quickly furnish a seating area before entertaining lots of family for Thanksgiving. We have continued to use them frequently! They are sturdy and good looking. I am very picky about fabrics and woodwork and I was impressed considering the cost. I agree with other reviewers that you can feel a bar across the center back but I draped a cushy blanket over the back and I don’t notice as much. We received several compliments on them! At first I thought they would be a cheap, temporary solution but I think we will hang on to them for a while!
customer_reviews.author: Leighs4ravens

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! LOVE! LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I initially was a little concerned about size of the chair against my sofas, but it all came together. I'm very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great looking accent chair, but if you are very tall you might want to consider a different chair. I’m 6’3 and the seat is a bit low for me but works nevertheless You might want an accent pillow for extra comfort for your back as it’s a bit hard but the seat itself is well padded and offers just enough comfort. I recommend having two people to assemble as it’s difficult with one.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron B.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible piece of art
customer_reviews.text: It is an incredible piece of art. I am picky type of person when I buy furniture for my home. I had already bought and returned a chairs that cost me double the price of this one, but this one its by far the best option that I made.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Lantigua

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive and really sturdy, well made chair. Mid century modern style. We receive a lot of compliments and the color is true to the online image. I would recommend this chair to anyone looking for solid, mid century style furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk R. Brandenburg

customer_reviews.title: I just wish I needed 2 instead of just one!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is so beautiful. The sleek dark wood arms and non - scratchy fabric are so rich and elegant looking. This is a perfect example of mid century modern furniture at its finest! Color is true to picture. I like the firmness of the seat. It’s sure to last a long time. An excellent buy for me!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy L

customer_reviews.title: Very Attractive Chair
customer_reviews.text: I only wished the back of the chair was 10 inches taller, it would have looked GRAND. assembly is ok but I think it would be easier if two persons put it together. Over all, it's a good buy and looks more pricier than the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Joe E

customer_reviews.title: REAL WOOD!
customer_reviews.text: Really not one to write reviews, but these chairs are really worth the money. Very reasonable for the price and quality. The wood pieces are real wood and come pre-assembled. Assembly is easy and took me about 10 mins per chair. The chairs came well-padded with styrofoam and without any damage. Deep enough to add a pillow as well. Comfortable and wear well; I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Vogel

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I think the chair is quite lovely, and it is for one of my rentals. It isn't comfortable at all and was SO SO hard to balance and assemble. Had I had another person to hold it, it would have been helpful. Now I have it assembled and I have to take the doors apart to get it out. what the heck. A headache this has been. BUT YES, it is pretty and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made easy to assemble chair. It looks quite nice when fully assembled and it is super sturdy. I have not found it very comfortable to sit in but maybe that is just me.
customer_reviews.author: Jene

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but useless
customer_reviews.text: Cant rate this chair is the box was poorly wrapped. Loose board floating in box. No hardware to assemble included. On the plus side the fabric was attractive, style nice but until the manufacturer sends me the hardware, so I can assemble the chair and test it out it only gets a 1 star. I may change my review at a later date but for now, not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: ellie

customer_reviews.title: Lexicon Accent Chairs
customer_reviews.text: Has a nice high end look, quality is good. But would like to know why I was charged shipping on both chairs. It states shipping is free on orders over $25. Order was $365. before taxes.
customer_reviews.author: Marian R.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my living space!
customer_reviews.text: Note: The two imperfections are minor and are mostly concealed int he final product, but still disappointing. I will edit this review to reflect my interaction with customer service. The back is a little stiff, but the seat is so so comfortable. The seat is a good height for sitting or throwing your legs up on an ottoman/pouf. Assembly was very quick and easy. Wood is a little light (as expected for the price) but has a nice finish with no imperfections except those I pictured. Upholstery is a sturdy and comfortable fabric and had no imperfections. The packaging seemed secure with styrofoam, foam wrapping and an empty box to keep everything in place, but minor damage still occurred.
customer_reviews.author: Harrison Pajovich

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Its actually a really pretty solid chair. The back is slightly hard but nothing a good pillow cannot help. The seat cushion is very comfy, so this is great for occasional seating. For the price I am pleasantly surprised at how nice the materials are and how easy it was to put together. Would 100% recommend it. I am probably going to buy a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance after reading the reviews and I'm not disappointed! Super easy to assemble, very sturdy and feels like a higher quality and more expensive chair. With a backside pillow, these will be a great addition.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Great looking chair-not for comfort
customer_reviews.text: I love that the chair has real wood! It was a quick and easy assembly and look great in our living room but it is not meant to be enjoyed for comfort. It is more of a decorative chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Missing a predrilled hole. Couldn't assemble. No quality control. It's not easy to repackage an entire chair after disassembling it to return.
customer_reviews.author: BookSurfer

customer_reviews.title: great chair
customer_reviews.text: love this chair. stylish. sturdy. i get lots of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie M

customer_reviews.title: Very study but semi-comfortable
customer_reviews.text: A very good looking chair that feels very sturdy and was super easy to assemble. Only issue I have with it is that it's not as comfortable as I would expect.
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: Awkward to Assemble, but Looks Nice
customer_reviews.text: This looks like a good contemporary piece. It was a little awkward to assemble and should require two people for holding up the pieces. The only drawback is the fabric gets a little wrinkled after someone sits on it.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Pasquali

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and comfy chair
customer_reviews.text: I really like this chair and thought might buy another on. Comfortable and looks just right for my living room. My only note is that one of the screws does not align so we were not able to put it in. But it's not going to break.
customer_reviews.author: Inday G.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Actually a very nice chair. Pleasantly surprised. It has a little bit of a "rock" to it after first assembled, but that has disappeared after one day of use. Great chair if you are looking for a nice accent! Perfect for reading.
customer_reviews.author: Adub

customer_reviews.title: Price should have been much lower
customer_reviews.text: The chair looks nice on photo than the actual. The seat cushion was too soft, it easily shrink when you seat on it. The seat should be reinforce more, it's only real support was one screw. I just have it for week, bought two haven't assemble the other one.
customer_reviews.author: alro24

customer_reviews.title: Very nice chair
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, very stylish chair. Sturdy and comfortable, better with an accent pillow. The back rest is flat, as the style demands. I bought two and love them. My cats love them as well, fabric seems durable and is easy to vacuum. I will highly recommend these chairs. I usually never give five stars, but they deserve it.
customer_reviews.author: David Long

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together! Honestly, I needed no help. The chair came in 5 pieces with hardware and was together in less than 20 minutes. The back isn't very plush, but it's very comfortable otherwise. I truly am pleased with the quality of this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Muir

customer_reviews.title: Love My New Chair
customer_reviews.text: My daughter put it together in ten minutes and it's beautiful. Not the most comfortable chair for a movie but does just what I need it for, look stylish in the corner and seems to be cat approved.
customer_reviews.author: TeamHowards

customer_reviews.title: nice, but back very hard
customer_reviews.text: It is a really beautifull chair, just like the picture, the only thing that i didnt like it is tha the back is extremely hard. you have to put a pillow or something because is very very hard
customer_reviews.author: Laura Otalora Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Great living room chair for a small space
customer_reviews.text: Great looking, wide seat, good reading chair! I love the orange upholstery. The fabric quality is not high end by any means but a great easy side chair in my small living room. We use it daily!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color of the final product and how well it went with my family room set up. What I didn't anticipate was needing three people to put the chairs together to avoid mistakes or scratches from appearing. Also the quality of the fabric could have been improved some. Color is lovely, but wish it were more stiff and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my chairs!!!
customer_reviews.text: Took the longest time to decide between the gray, orange or tan. Finally decided on the tan (they call it brown). It’s a pretty dark tan. The wood is solid and heavy. Took me 90 minutes to put 2 chairs together by myself. Probably would have taken half that time if I had help. Expecting years of use out of my chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: Great chair! Shocked at the quality. The wood is gorgeous. I can’t say it’s the most comfortable thing in the world, but I don’t think anyone is buying this chair and expecting a recliner! Lol Excellent purchase and excellent price point.
customer_reviews.author: TnT

customer_reviews.title: Great value, comfortable, stylish
customer_reviews.text: Had the chair together in about ten minutes. Getting everything out of the box took longer than installation. The chair is super comfy and quite solid. I love the color too!
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This chair looks way more expensive than it is. Solid wood. It’s very easy to put together, sturdy, and reasonably comfortable. It’s not going to sink in anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and aesthetically pleasing chair. I wish it was double the size. The back part is very stiff and not the most comfortable but we have a throw pillow that fixes that issue. The bottom cushion is actually very comfortable though. It also rides low, it's not a tall chair keep that in mind. Overall we love it, we got it in grey and we have a small place so it works.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Reina

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful in appearance and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a similar chair recently for twice the price but it is in no way a attractive, comfortable and sturdy as this chair! Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Good chair overall!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and a good price! Its pretty comfortable and sits low. The arms are low as well, its deep enough for my to lift my legs up and a nice color
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: May work for you, not me.
customer_reviews.text: Was missing a wood dowel and had to used my own. Easy to assemble, but the seat doesn’t sit perfect and is tighter on one side. I’m not saying the dimensions are off but the chair does seem smaller once assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa V.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Fabric is a beautiful color but the fabric on the chair wasnt taut. has huge wrinkles in the seat which will only get worse with time!
customer_reviews.author: S.Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chairs
customer_reviews.text: The chairs look awesome. They were easy to assemble. The back of the chair doesn't have very much cushion so they aren't super comfortable but they are ok to sit in for a little while. As accent chairs that don't get used a lot these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A. Katke

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: Great chair. Very sleek and mid-century modern. The fabric has a slight tint of yellow In daylight, but overall it’s a light cream color. Wood is sturdy and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Madrid

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair! Easy to assemble and comfortable. I'm getting another one so we have two matching ones in our bedroom sitting area. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Great looking chair.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived three days earlier than expected. Extremely easy to assemble. Very sturdy. Very nice looking. Back is not very comfortable. Overall great chair.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: It’s OK get what you pay for want something better then pay more
customer_reviews.text: The instructions for assembly were very poor and ended up just figuring it out on my own. If your not savvy on assembly don’t buy this chair
customer_reviews.author: pamala

customer_reviews.title: Great buy - both design & craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Really surprised how great these chairs are! Super comfy and very sturdy. People think they're vintage. High recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ladybird gem

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Item came quickly and everything needed to assemble it was in the box. Went together quickly less than 30 minutes. Chair is study. Color is a described.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Jones

customer_reviews.title: flaw in fabric
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are lovely and just what I wanted for my MCM family room. However, one of the chairs has a noticeable flaw in the fabric. I would be satisfied with a new bottom cushion for the chair but the return process doesn't allow any means of communication with the dealer.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: Really nice chairs!!! The back cusion is hard but comfortable!! Definately recommend this chair!!
customer_reviews.author: becky mass

customer_reviews.title: Cute as a button!
customer_reviews.text: This cute little chair brightened up my living room perfectly. Very easy to assemble and amazingly sturdy. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa D Brown

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are awesome! They are stylish and comfortable. The bottom cushion is nice and thick and the wood is really sleek. We are tall people and these chairs are comfy to read in for hours.
customer_reviews.author: A. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality is much less then I had hoped for. The comfort level is low. Biggest disappointment is the quality of the fabric, it is very thin and loose on the foam resulting in wrinkles that don’t want to come out. The orange color is much duller than the pic or description. This chair would be what I would expect if the price was half of what it was.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Solid piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Great chair for the price! The wood is real and the cushion is very thick. The fabric is a little wrinkled but overall it’s a nice chair and I’m happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this chair! From the color to the quality, but only giving 4 stars because it came with a crack in the leg
customer_reviews.author: L.Catoe

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chair (Not So Much)
customer_reviews.text: Easier Assembly Takes 2 people. Nice Chair Want To See What The Seat Cushion Does Over Time Of Use. Well ... We've had the chair for for a few days and the fabric on the seat cushion is very wrinkled & loose and it seems like the seat cushion is showing wear too ... It's not keeping it's original form. A little disappointing seems nothing is made with quality any more.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D. Gressel

customer_reviews.title: Firm but comfortable chair
customer_reviews.text: The chair feels sturdy and looks great. The chair is firmer than you might think it would be. However, the chair is comfortable to sit in for extended time. I find it comfortable. It’s really unfortunate that the company doesn’t make a matching ottoman for this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hemphill

customer_reviews.title: beautiful chair
customer_reviews.text: The wood is lighter than I envisioned but I didn't pay that much attention when ordering it to the wood color. It is a beautiful, sturdy chair and would recommend to anyone that likes this style.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Balhaj

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, quality chair for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! Very easy to assemble and the wood has a nice grain and beautiful color.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Mallery

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a $1000 chair and a perfect accent to our high end contemporary leather furniture from Macy's. Very easy to put together. Took about 20 minutes and 2 people. Very sturdy and great materials. Don't hesitate if considering.
customer_reviews.author: Althea Olson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Needed an accent chair and this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ella R. Baas

customer_reviews.title: Good design, worst cushions I’ve ever sat on.
customer_reviews.text: These look beautiful, but the cushions are as cheap and uncomfortable as they get. Do not recommend. Sad because it’s a nice design.
customer_reviews.author: Hi!

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, relatively comfortable, seems sturdy And good quality
customer_reviews.author: Kernow

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chair
customer_reviews.text: This works well in our mid-century house. I love the orange color and sleek design! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: R & K Esposito

customer_reviews.title: Nice simple design, fairly well built
customer_reviews.text: Look great, not an amazingly comfortable chair but get the job done. Wood is a great color - complements the fabric color very well.
customer_reviews.author: Marc S.

customer_reviews.title: Lexicon Chair
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this chair. Beautiful and seems sturdy. Very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a guest room. Extremely easy to set-up. Very sturdy but perhaps just a little hard but perfect for our use.
customer_reviews.author: MDB313

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair/Thin fabric
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this in orange as an accent chair for our living room. Super easy to put together and sits very nicely. Only thing I'd say about it negative is the fabric seems a little thin and like it may rip or pick easily but other than that, I'm very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Have a seat with style!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect seating for guest bedroom. It a shorter chair but mostly for deco in the guest bedroom so height is not a prob. Bought tan and wood and fabric are exactly as pictured. Would by again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit on the pricey side out of a lot of chairs that I had been looking at but I absolutely love the chair. Very spacious but sturdy. It’s really comfortable and I really like the aesthetic and overall look. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Great chair! It was simple to assemble - only taking approximately 15 minutes. Sturdy but it isn't heavy, so it is easy to move, if needed. Stylish and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kim M

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The assembling instructions are incomplete and very poorly written. The seat fabric started wrinkling within twenty minutes of sitting on it. They are very pretty to look at. Will wait and see how long they last.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sturdy...good buy
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had these chairs since November 2019 and they are amazing. My husband is 6’3” and I’m 5’10” and we use these daily. They are very comfortable and are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and love the wide armrests - they're very comfortable. The charcoal grey is a good neutral. Only drawback so far is the seat cushion is indenting a bit from hubby's backside after 5 months, but he's been sitting in it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: ctbenjamin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Accent Piece
customer_reviews.text: Cute, ended up being more orange than I expected. Mostly easy to put together doable with 1 person but would be much easier with 2.
customer_reviews.author: Khadeisha Boone

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not the most comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This chair is so cute and stylish however it is not the most comfortable. We put a pillow to make the back more comfortable, but it is mostly used for looks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not comfy but looks cool
customer_reviews.text: Very low back not comfortable good look and quality but it’s more of a hotel chair you sit in for 5 minutes not a lounger
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Real nice for the price. Sturdy and comfy. Wood is very nice and goes great with my decor.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Haney

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: Nice chair , however the assembly was not easy and it makes a sound when you lean back , and the fabric on the seat gathers up when you get up.
customer_reviews.author: Hassam a.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Scandinavian style!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! This is more of an accent chair, I did not expect to really sit in it. While it's not bad, I would not say it is comfortable. The chair does seem of good quality and looks really good in the corner of my master bedroom. I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool Looking Chair BUT It Showed Up With A Snag in The Fabric.
customer_reviews.text: Cool looking Chair but I'm returning this. Even at the price, I'm not accepting it with a snag in the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Scheel

customer_reviews.title: Bottom cushion not soft
customer_reviews.text: The back was soft but the bottom was too hard! Easy to assemble, very sturdy, attractive But bottom cushion wasn’t comfortable .
customer_reviews.author: Rashelle

customer_reviews.title: we like it
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad and my wife very happy with the chair, we used in our living room. We recomended
customer_reviews.author: juan J campos

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. It was super easy to put together, I did it myself in 15 minutes. Really good quay and sharp looking chair. I’m actually going to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine L. Rondelli

customer_reviews.title: Mid century look!
customer_reviews.text: Were a fan! It’s a little stiff, but hopefully with time it’ll soften up a little and become more cozy but it’s exactly the look we wanted and loved the quick shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Love it and it matches perfectly. The only down side is that the back isn’t as comfortable as I would wish. We bought it as an accent piece so it doesn’t bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Zwart

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and well made
customer_reviews.text: this chair is beautiful in person! it’s looks much more expensive than it is. i’ve sent the link to buy it to four clients that saw it in my studio. may buy two for home.
customer_reviews.author: Sybil Divine

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: Very nice chairs. We’ve already received many compliments. Strong and sturdy chairs. Cushions are a tad too hard but not anything to turn you away from purchasing these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute chair.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the chair since its just a few dollars cheaper what was listed on other sites. It did have a weird smell, and it doesn't seem like it would hold in the washer. Other than that, content with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: We had  a broken box upon receiving
customer_reviews.text: Box was broken when arrived Easy To assemble Comfort too hard
customer_reviews.author: Denis Touchette

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the chair for the price I paid.

customer_reviews.title: best bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this chair. Easy to assemble in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Tirrel

product_meta.title: Lexicon Fabric Accent Chair, Orange
product_meta.description: Color:OrangeThe retro-inspired wood framing of the Elle Collection will perfectly accent your modern home décor. Subtle contouring to the chair’s wood frame is finished in walnut, presenting as a classic complement to the bold hues and neutral tones of the 5 offered fabrics that cover the padded seats and backs – orange, blue, light brown, gray and dark gray.
feature_bullets: Well crafted wood frame in walnut Finish
Seat Construction: Zig-Zag Spring; weight capacity: 300lbs. Per seat
